doc:
Russell Thorson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Thorson 0 Russell Thorson (October 14, 1906 – July 6, 1982) was an American actor, perhaps best known for his co-starring role as Det. Lt. Otto Lindstrom in ABC's 1959-62 hit crime drama, The Detectives Starring Robert Taylor. Russell_Thorson ( October_14_,_1906 – July_6_,_1982 ) was an_American_actor , perhaps_best_known for his_co-starring_role as Det._Lt._Otto_Lindstrom in ABC 's 1959-62_hit crime_drama , The_Detectives Starring Robert_Taylor .
